enchantment.shieldsplus.recoil.desc: Knocks back entities and returns projectiles to sender
enchantment.shieldsplus.reflection.desc: Damages entities by 12.5% per level of the damage dealt
enchantment.shieldsplus.reinforced.desc: Increases damage blocked by 0.5 per level
enchantment.shieldsplus.ablaze.desc: Sets attacking entities and projectiles on fire
enchantment.shieldsplus.lightweight.desc: Makes the player move faster when blocking
enchantment.shieldsplus.fast_recovery.de: Reduces the Shield cooldown by 0.6 seconds
enchantment.shieldsplus.shield_bash.desc: Block with the Shield for 1.5 seconds. After that, tap sneak to bash and damage any entity in your path
